string.text: Enabling this will replace the original TOR health deduction injury mechanism with a speed reduction within the Cursed Site area.
Enabling this will add a mechanism to the castle: when the team is hostile to a nearby castle, they will suffer a movement speed penalty; otherwise, they will receive a movement speed bonus.
Enabling this will restore the mechanism for saving captives.
Enabling this will strengthen the recruitment mechanism of the Wood Elf culture. When the AI is in the Wood Elf Forest, there will be a higher chance of receiving Treeman aid.
